alert.note: Alert for Orange County Inland; Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning; Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 22 at 11:56AM PST until January 22 at 6:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 65 mph. Highest gusts near 80 mph will be confined to the most wind prone mountain areas and near and below the Cajon Pass. * WHERE...San Bernardino County Mountains, San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning, Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills, Riverside County Mountains, Orange County Inland Areas and San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire. * WHEN...Until 6 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Use caution if you must drive.
